rounds.comments: (Alex: We'll give you the director and the composer, you identify the film.)

clues.text:
A 1975 thriller:
Steven Spielberg,
John Williams

You've got a friend in this 1995 film:
John Lasseter,
Randy Newman

A 1983 weeper & Oscar fave:
James L. Brooks,
Michael Gore

A 1962 epic:
David Lean,
Maurice Jarre

2 pianos, 1 gorgeous blonde:
Steven Kloves,
David Grusin

This capital city is the state's second most populous

rounds.text: In 1970 he became the first professional actor to be named a lord
